mapper.select: select a.* from (select c.chapid,c.chapname,br.btime,b.bookid,b.bookname,bt.btname,u.uname,u.uuid from browse br inner join chapter c on br.chapid=c.chapid inner join roll r on c.rollid=r.rollid inner join books b on r.bookid=b.bookid inner join booktype bt on b.btid=bt.btid inner join users u on b.uuid=u.uuid) a where a.chapid in (select b.cid from (select max(c.chapid) cid,b.bookid,b.bookname,bt.btname,u.uname from browse br inner join chapter c on br.chapid=c.chapid inner join roll r on c.rollid=r.rollid inner join books b on r.bookid=b.bookid inner join booktype bt on b.btid=bt.btid inner join users u on b.uuid=u.uuid group by b.bookid,b.bookname,bt.btname,u.uname) b) and a.uuid = #{uuid}

select br.brid,bt.btname,b.bookname,b.bookstate,c.chaptime,u.uname, (select count(uuid) from bookrack) num from bookrack br inner join books b on br.bookid = b.bookid inner join booktype bt on bt.btid = b.btid inner join users u on u.uuid = b.uuid inner join roll r on r.bookid = b.bookid inner join chapter c on c.rollid = r.rollid where br.uuid = #{param1} and (b.bookname like concat('%',#{param2},'%') or u.uname like concat('%',#{param2},'%')) group by b.bookid order by c.chaptime desc
select * from bookrack where uuid = #{param1} and bookid = #{param2}
